item.title: By: Dave
item.dc:creator: Dave
item.description:
Yeah, this quote's great, as is your take on it. But it's not really an either/or thing, is it? The idea underlying shock therapy is that the 'target' populations are so shocked that they unlearn how to resist the new, neoliberal policies that are imposed. Collective identies are destroyed, so society becomes a 'blank slate'.
This all links to stuff we've written before about reinvention and decomposition/recomposition, I think.
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, this quote’s great, as is your take on it. But it’s not really an either/or thing, is it? The idea underlying shock therapy is that the ‘target’ populations are so shocked that they unlearn how to resist the new, neoliberal policies that are imposed. Collective identies are destroyed, so society becomes a ‘blank slate’.

This all links to stuff we’ve written before about reinvention and decomposition/recomposition, I think.
